attributes.additional_details: CAMPAIGN TO INVESTIGATE THE WAY THAT VOSA ISSUES PROHIBITION NOTICES AND FOR WHAT DEFECTS AS APPLICABLE TO LGV;S.THE STRUGGLING HAULAGE INDUSTRY IS IN FREEFALL DUE TO FUEL COSTS,LOW RATES AND LESS WORK ,VOSA SHOULD BE HELPING OUR INDUSTRY NOT HINDERING IT.THE TIME HAS COME TO MAKE A STAND,DO SOMETHING TO EFFECT A CHANGE IN THE WAY OUR INDUSTRY IS POLICED
